job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent education and/or experience

jd: From: Sandhyarani, Vyze inc sandhyarani@vyzeinc.com Reply to: sandhyarani@vyzeinc.com Scrum MasterUSC/GCLos Angeles, CA – Onsite (Locals only) ( Virtual Interview)Client : Solugenix Must Have Scrum Master CertificationMust Have Prior healthcare insurance payer experience.Minimum of 1 year of experience working as a Project Manager. Qualifications Required:· Bachelor's Degree.· In lieu of a degree, equivalent education and/or experience may be considered.· At least 5-7 years of Scrum Master experience in a multi-Scrum environment managing projects using JIRA.· At least 5-7 years of Scrum Master experience in a multi-Scrum environment managing projects in cross-functional teams.· At least 1-2 years of Scrum Master experience managing projects using Confluence.Trainings Preferred:· Project Management· Additional Agile Roles (Product Manager, Product Owner)· Minimum of 5 years of Scrum experience working in a mixed AGILE and traditional I.T. environment.
